name: Gutball
description:
Get down with the Sickness...

Incepted during TOJam 13, Gutball is a fast-paced platformer game which has you assume the role of a spherical nanobot tasked with clearing a goat of its bacterial infection. Roll, jump, and speed around to cure our beloved goat!

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys - Roll

Space - Jump

Tap space repeatedly to get more speed and air on slopes!

Credits
